capsule.error.areaNotLoaded: Can't deploy: destination zone not loaded
capsule.error.blueprintCreationError: An error occured during blueprint template creation. This blueprint might not work.
capsule.error.blueprintDontMatch: Can't undeploy: you may charge the blueprint capsule (left click in air), or ensure the area you want to undeploy matches the blueprint structure (no removed or added blocks, no items in inventories).
capsule.error.blueprintExcluded: Some blocks are not supported in blueprints. Ignored in blueprint: %s
capsule.error.cantDownload: Can't download nbt template: take the capsule item in hand and make sure it is undeployed and not empty. Try to preview deploy (without deploying) before retrying this command.
capsule.error.cantMergeWithDestination: Can't merge with destination, a block is preventing the deployment at %s.
capsule.error.capsuleContentNotFound: Capsule "%s" was not found in the world "structures" folder
capsule.error.noCaptureBase: There were no Capture Base around.
capsule.error.notAllowed: Capsules can't be used here, it might be a protected area.
capsule.error.technicalError: A technical error occured while using the Capsule Mod. Please check the server logs.
capsule.error.templateNotFound: Error: the capsule template file %s was not found.
capsule.gui.title: Capsule renaming
capsule.tooltip.author: Designed by
capsule.tooltip.blueprint: Takes items from linked inventory to build structure
capsule.tooltip.blueprintUseCharged:
* Right click: instant deploy
* Sneak+Right click: link inventory
capsule.tooltip.blueprintUseUncharged:
* Left click: charge from inventory
* Right click: undo last deploy
* Sneak+Right click: link inventory
capsule.tooltip.canRotate:
* Left click: rotate
* Sneak+Left click: mirror
enchantment.capsule.recall.desc: When deployed, the capsule is immediately sent back to player.
items.capsule.name: Capsule
jei.capsule.desc.blueprintCapsule:
Can deploy several times the structure by using materials from a linked inventory.
The structure is copied from the capsule used in craft.
* Left click to charge
* Shift+right click an inventory to link.
* Craft with any capsule to update structure.
* Player's inventory will be used if material miss from linked inventory.
* Can be dyied.
jei.capsule.desc.capsule:
Capture a region using a Capture Base. Right click to activate, right click again to throw.
* Can be upgraded if empty by crafting with Popped Chorus Fruit.
jei.capsule.desc.capsuleMarker: Place under the region you want to capture with a capsule. Displays a preview of the capture when holding an empty capsule.
jei.capsule.desc.linkedCapsule:
Created by capturing a region using an empty capsule on a Capture Base.
Right click to activate, Then throw and deploy. Right click to undeploy.
* Can be emptied in a crafting table (a recovery capsule is given back).
* Can by dyed.
jei.capsule.desc.opCapsule: Special Capsule which can capture special blocks that a standard capsule would ignore.
jei.capsule.desc.recoveryCapsule:
One Use Capsule.
Is linked to the same content as the Capsule it was crafted from.
Tip : Craft one and place it in a safe place in case the original capsule is lost.
